Change Password

Use the Change Password dialog box to change the password that you entered in the Login dialog box. After you change it, your old password no longer works, and you must use the new password.

You must enter your current password in order to change it. If you forget your password, ask your Administrator to change it for you.

After you change your password, it will take effect the next time you log in to Version Manager. Note that Version Manager passwords are case sensitive.

Field Descriptions

Old password Enter your current password.
New password Enter your new password.
Verify Re-enter your new password.
